```py
select job_title, 
       avg(salary_in_usd) as average_salary_in_usd 
from my_db.ds_salaries
GROUP BY job_title
ORDER BY job_title
```

```py
import duckdb

token = "insert token here"
# initiate the MotherDuck connection
con = duckdb.connect(f'md:?motherduck_token={token}')
```

```py
q = """
select job_title,
       avg(salary_in_usd) as average_salary_in_usd
from my_db.ds_salaries
GROUP BY job_title
ORDER BY job_title
"""

con.sql(q).show()
```
